titleStmt.title: The final conclusion or up-shutting of Mr. Ogilby's standing lottery of books; which opened on the second day of June last, to the general satisfaction of all that took cognizance thereof, especially the adventurers.
titleStmt.author: Ogilby, John, 1600-1676.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
